message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $20,000 to start the conversation. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This offer reflects the true worth of the product.
I appreciate your persistence, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
